tasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project with TypeScript
tasks.description: Set up the foundational Next.js 15+ project with TypeScript, essential dependencies, and development tooling
tasks.details: Create new Next.js 15+ project with TypeScript using `npx create-next-app@latest organizer --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app`. Install core dependencies: @types/node, @types/react, @types/react-dom. Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode. Set up ESLint with TypeScript rules and Prettier for code formatting. Initialize package.json scripts for dev, build, lint, and type-check.

tasks.title: Configure Database with Prisma and PostgreSQL
tasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM, including schema initialization and connection configuration following comprehensive 9-step implementation plan
tasks.details: Following approved implementation plan: 1) Install Prisma CLI and client packages, 2) Initialize Prisma configuration, 3) Set up PostgreSQL with Docker, 4) Configure environment variables, 5) Create initial Prisma schema, 6) Generate Prisma client, 7) Test database connection, 8) Set up connection pooling, 9) Verify complete setup. Focus on proper Auth.js v5 integration requirements and production-ready configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test database connection with `npx prisma db push`, verify Prisma client generation works correctly, confirm Docker PostgreSQL container starts and accepts connections, and validate schema migrations apply successfully

tasks.title: Implement Authentication System with Auth.js v5
tasks.description: Set up complete authentication system using Auth.js v5 with Google OAuth and email/password support
tasks.details: Install Auth.js v5: `npm install next-auth@beta @auth/prisma-adapter`. Configure auth.config.ts with Google OAuth provider and credentials provider. Set up Prisma adapter for session storage. Create auth API routes in app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts. Implement middleware for route protection. Configure environment variables for Google OAuth (GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET, NEXTAUTH_SECRET). Set up session management with JWT tokens.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Google OAuth flow, email/password registration/login, session persistence, and route protection middleware

tasks.title: Design Core Database Schema
tasks.description: Create comprehensive Prisma schema for all core entities with proper relationships and constraints following 8-phase implementation plan
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive Prisma schema design in 8 phases on feature/database-schema branch: 1) User extension for Auth.js v5 compatibility, 2) Project foundation with core project model, 3) Task management entities, 4) Supporting entities (Note, Reminder, Milestone, Category), 5) Organizational structure (Team, Phase), 6) Notification system integration, 7) Performance optimization with proper indexes, 8) Schema validation and testing. Define 9 new core entities with proper relationships: User-Project many-to-many via collaborators, Project one-to-many with tasks/notes/etc. Include audit fields (createdAt, updatedAt) and soft delete support. Configure cascade deletes and referential integrity constraints.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `npx prisma generate` and `npx prisma db push` successfully for each phase, verify all relationships work correctly, test constraint validations, and confirm Auth.js v5 compatibility throughout implementation

subtasks.title: Phase 1: User Extension for Auth.js v5
subtasks.description: Extend User model to maintain Auth.js v5 compatibility while adding Organizer-specific fields
subtasks.details:
Modify existing User model to include additional fields needed for Organizer while preserving Auth.js v5 structure. Add fields like profile settings, preferences, and organizational metadata.
<info added on 2025-07-16T10:27:25.453Z>
Phase 1 implementation began with comprehensive research into Prisma best practices, soft delete patterns, strategic indexing, and Auth.js v5 integration requirements. Research findings confirm compatibility approach for extending User model while maintaining Auth.js structure. Currently implementing User model extensions with project management fields including profile settings, preferences, and organizational metadata while preserving all Auth.js v5 required fields and relationships.
</info added on 2025-07-16T10:27:25.453Z>

subtasks.title: Phase 2: Project Foundation
subtasks.description: Create core Project model with basic fields and relationships
subtasks.details: Define Project model with essential fields: name, description, status, visibility, createdAt, updatedAt, deletedAt. Set up initial User-Project relationship structure.

subtasks.title: Phase 3: Task Management Entities
subtasks.description: Implement Task model with comprehensive task management features
subtasks.details:
Create Task model with fields for title, description, status, priority, due dates, assignments, and relationships to Project and User. Include task hierarchy support.
<info added on 2025-07-16T10:28:12.727Z>
Phase 3: Task Management implementation started. Project foundation completed with Project model, ProjectMember junction table, and proper enums (ProjectStatus, ProjectVisibility, ProjectRole). User-Project many-to-many relationship established. Now implementing Task model with hierarchical structure and proper relationships.
</info added on 2025-07-16T10:28:12.727Z>

subtasks.title: Phase 4: Supporting Entities
subtasks.description: Add Note, Reminder, Milestone, and Category models
subtasks.details: Create supporting models: Note (with rich text support), Reminder (with scheduling), Milestone (with progress tracking), and Category (for organization). Link all to appropriate parent entities.

subtasks.title: Phase 5: Organizational Structure
subtasks.description: Implement Team and Phase models for project organization
subtasks.details: Create Team model for user collaboration and Phase model for project timeline management. Set up many-to-many relationships between users and teams, and one-to-many between projects and phases.

subtasks.title: Phase 6: Notification System Integration
subtasks.description: Add Notification model and integrate with existing entities
subtasks.details: Create Notification model with type, data, read status, and user relationships. Set up triggers and relationships with other entities for comprehensive notification support.

subtasks.title: Phase 7: Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Add indexes, constraints, and performance optimizations
subtasks.details: Implement proper database indexes for frequently queried fields, set up cascade deletes, add referential integrity constraints, and optimize query performance.

subtasks.title: Phase 8: Schema Validation and Testing
subtasks.description: Validate complete schema and test all relationships
subtasks.details: Run comprehensive schema validation, test all entity relationships, verify constraint enforcement, and confirm Auth.js v5 compatibility. Execute final `npx prisma generate` and `npx prisma db push`.

tasks.title: Set up tRPC API Layer
tasks.description: Implement type-safe API layer using tRPC for client-server communication with proper error handling
tasks.details: Install tRPC: `npm install @trpc/server @trpc/client @trpc/react-query @trpc/next @tanstack/react-query`. Create tRPC router structure with context including user session and Prisma client. Set up API routes in app/api/trpc/[trpc]/route.ts. Implement error handling middleware with proper error codes. Create tRPC client configuration with React Query integration. Set up TypeScript types for end-to-end type safety.
tasks.testStrategy: Test tRPC router initialization, verify type safety across client-server boundary, and confirm error handling works correctly

tasks.title: Create Project CRUD Operations
tasks.description: Implement complete CRUD operations for projects including creation, reading, updating, deletion, and archiving
tasks.details: Create tRPC procedures for: createProject, getProject, updateProject, deleteProject, archiveProject, and listProjects. Implement proper authorization checks ensuring only owners can modify projects. Add pagination for project listings. Include validation using Zod schemas for input validation. Implement optimistic updates for better UX. Add support for project settings and metadata.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all CRUD operations with various user roles, verify authorization works correctly, and confirm data validation prevents invalid inputs

tasks.title: Build Basic UI Layout and Navigation
tasks.description: Create the foundational UI structure with navigation, layout components, and routing using Next.js App Router
tasks.details: Create app layout with collapsible sidebar navigation using Tailwind CSS. Implement responsive design for desktop and mobile. Set up Next.js App Router with nested layouts. Create reusable components: Header, Sidebar, MainContent, and navigation components. Implement dark/light theme support. Add loading states and error boundaries. Use Tailwind CSS for consistent styling and responsive design.
tasks.testStrategy: Test responsive behavior across different screen sizes, verify navigation works correctly, and confirm theme switching functions properly

tasks.title: Implement Task Management System
tasks.description: Create comprehensive task management with CRUD operations, status tracking, and assignment features
tasks.details: Create tRPC procedures for task operations: createTask, updateTask, deleteTask, assignTask, and updateTaskStatus. Implement task types ('Waiting for user X', 'User Y is waiting for me'). Add support for due dates, descriptions, and priorities. Create task status enum (pending, in-progress, completed, blocked). Implement task ownership transfer and dependency tracking. Add bulk operations for efficiency.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task creation, assignment, status updates, and bulk operations. Verify task types work correctly and dependencies are properly tracked

tasks.title: Create Project and Task UI Components
tasks.description: Build user interfaces for project and task management with intuitive UX and real-time updates
tasks.details: Create React components for project dashboard, task lists, task cards, and task details. Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task organization. Add inline editing for quick updates. Create modal dialogs for task creation and editing. Implement filtering and sorting options. Add keyboard shortcuts for power users. Use React Query for data fetching and caching.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all UI interactions, verify drag-and-drop works correctly, confirm inline editing saves properly, and validate keyboard shortcuts

tasks.title: Set up State Management with Zustand
tasks.description: Implement client-side state management for UI state, user preferences, and optimistic updates
tasks.details: Install Zustand: `npm install zustand`. Create stores for: user preferences, UI state (sidebar collapsed, theme), and temporary state. Implement optimistic updates for better UX. Add persistence for user preferences using localStorage. Create typed store interfaces. Implement middleware for development debugging and state persistence.
tasks.testStrategy: Test state persistence across page refreshes, verify optimistic updates work correctly, and confirm store performance with large datasets

tasks.title: Implement Team Management and Collaboration
tasks.description: Create team creation, member management, and project collaboration features with role-based access control
tasks.details: Create Team model with many-to-many User relationships. Implement tRPC procedures for team operations: createTeam, addMember, removeMember, updateRoles. Add role-based permissions (owner, admin, member, viewer). Create invitation system with email notifications. Implement project sharing with team members. Add collaboration audit trail for tracking changes.
tasks.testStrategy: Test team creation, member management, role assignments, and permission enforcement across different user roles

tasks.title: Build Notes and Reminders System
tasks.description: Create note-taking and reminder functionality within project contexts with rich text support
tasks.details: Implement Note model with rich text content support. Create tRPC procedures for note CRUD operations. Add reminder system with due date notifications. Implement rich text editor using Tiptap or similar. Add support for file attachments and mentions. Create search functionality for notes. Implement note sharing and collaboration features.
tasks.testStrategy: Test note creation, rich text editing, file attachments, reminder notifications, and search functionality

tasks.title: Set up Real-time Updates with WebSockets
tasks.description: Implement real-time synchronization for collaborative features using WebSockets or Server-Sent Events
tasks.details: Install WebSocket libraries: `npm install ws @types/ws`. Create WebSocket server using Next.js API routes. Implement real-time subscriptions for project updates, task changes, and new comments. Add connection management and reconnection logic. Create client-side hooks for real-time data. Implement conflict resolution for concurrent edits.
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time updates across multiple browser sessions, verify connection stability, and confirm conflict resolution works correctly

tasks.title: Create Notification System
tasks.description: Build comprehensive notification system with in-app notifications, email alerts, and preference management
tasks.details: Create Notification model with type, data, and read status. Implement notification triggers for task assignments, due dates, mentions, and project updates. Set up email notifications using Nodemailer or similar. Create in-app notification center with real-time updates. Implement notification preferences and settings. Add notification batching to prevent spam.
tasks.testStrategy: Test notification triggers, email delivery, in-app notification display, and preference management functionality

tasks.title: Implement Categories and Milestones
tasks.description: Create flexible categorization system and milestone tracking for project organization
tasks.details: Create Category and Milestone models with project relationships. Implement color-coded categories for tasks and notes. Add milestone tracking with progress visualization. Create category management UI with drag-and-drop organization. Implement milestone timeline views. Add filtering and grouping by categories and milestones.
tasks.testStrategy: Test category creation, color assignments, milestone tracking, progress visualization, and filtering functionality

tasks.title: Build Phase Management System
tasks.description: Create project phases with timeline tracking, progress monitoring, and phase-based reporting
tasks.details: Create Phase model with start/end dates and project relationship. Implement phase-based task organization. Add timeline visualization for project phases. Create phase progress tracking and reporting. Implement phase dependencies and scheduling. Add Gantt chart-like view for phase management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test phase creation, timeline visualization, progress tracking, and phase dependency management

tasks.title: Implement MCP Server
tasks.description: Create MCP server implementation for AI assistant integration with resource exposure and tool implementations
tasks.details: Install MCP TypeScript SDK: `npm install @modelcontextprotocol/sdk-typescript`. Create MCP server with resource exposure for projects, tasks, and notes. Implement tools for CRUD operations accessible to AI assistants. Add WebSocket support for real-time MCP updates. Create proper authentication and authorization for MCP access. Document MCP API endpoints and capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test MCP server startup, resource exposure, tool implementations, and WebSocket connectivity with AI assistants

tasks.title: Set up Redis Caching Layer
tasks.description: Implement Redis for caching, session storage, and real-time features optimization
tasks.details: Install Redis client: `npm install redis @types/redis`. Set up Redis Docker container in docker-compose.yml. Implement caching layer for frequently accessed data. Add Redis-based session storage. Create cache invalidation strategies. Implement Redis pub/sub for real-time features. Add cache warming and monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Redis connection, cache hit/miss ratios, session persistence, and pub/sub functionality

tasks.title: Create Search and Filtering System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive search functionality across projects, tasks, and notes with advanced filtering options
tasks.details: Implement full-text search using PostgreSQL full-text search capabilities. Create search API endpoints with pagination. Add advanced filtering by status, assignee, due date, and categories. Implement search result highlighting. Create saved search functionality. Add search analytics and suggestions. Optimize search performance with proper indexing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search accuracy, filtering combinations, search performance with large datasets, and saved search functionality

tasks.title: Implement External Integrations (Jira/Slack)
tasks.description: Create integration framework with Jira and Slack for task synchronization and notifications
tasks.details: Create integration framework with OAuth 2.0 support. Implement Jira API integration for issue sync using Jira REST API v3. Add Slack Web API integration for notifications. Create webhook system for real-time updates. Implement field mapping and conflict resolution. Add integration settings and management UI. Create error handling and retry mechanisms for API failures.
tasks.testStrategy: Test OAuth flows, Jira issue sync, Slack notification delivery, webhook processing, and error handling for API failures
